Home » 40P11 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
6 Kusalattika, Pītittika
Kusalattika, Pītittika
21.
54Nakusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nakusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nakusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca… . (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
55Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa…pe…  vipāke nava…pe…  avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
<< 5 Kusalattika, Vitakkattikaup7 Kusalattika, Dassanattikādi >>
